We went to Mayura for lunch and were pleasantly surprised by the ambiance.  The seating is cozy and we got a seat right next to the window.Service:SUCKS!!! I mean it took the waitress 5-10 minutes to even bring out the menu and offer us something to drink.  When we ordered an additional item, it took them 20 minutes to bring it out (we were already done with lunch by that time).Food:The only option to order was the 'Thali'.  We ordered the Vegetarian Thali which came with 3 things (Channa Masala, Subzi Mixed, and Palak Paneer).  The food was decent, but the bread was cold.  We were very hungry, so we didnt think much about the quality.  But we definitely ate better Indian food at Rajah (near Las Ramblas).
